title: The Love We Make
description: Ethan was my best friend.Ace pitcher for the Atlanta Kings.My confidant.My protector.The man I loved most in the worldâ€”as a brother of course.He was supposed to be supportive and helpful and caring.But he was actually crazy.And never more so than after I told him my plan to lose my virginity. In the blink of an eye, Ethan went from brotherly love to overprotective daddy.And now I was the one going crazy.He had to back off before he risked our friendship.So we made a deal.A deal to end all deals.With timelines, conditions, and even an exit strategy.It would save the trust and love we made as friends.It would help us get back to being us.Or so I thought.
author: Katie Rae
